creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Man in a wide rimmed hat and long pants; he drags a heavy object behind as while he walks; the words "March 1988/He tried to carry something too large./He felt like he was falling" inscribed, UC; predominant colors: blue, grey and yellow
medium: Lithograph with hand-coloring on handmade paper
title: Study for "March 1988 - He Tried to Carry Something Too Large, He Felt Like He Was Falling", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
